Name: A fMRI neuroimaging dataset of word reading with semantic and phonological localizers in children and adolescents
Acknowledgements: This project was supported by National Institute of Deafness and other Communication Disorders (grant numbers R01 DC018171) awarded to James R Booth. We thank Rachel Banik (Watkins), Angela Scruggs, Chris Brozdowski, Daniel Devor, Clara Plutzer, Rachael Rice, Anna Banaszkiewicz, and Carly Leannah.
HowToAcknowledge:
Please cite this paper: 
Wang, J., Vess, A., Mathur, A., Wagley, N., Quinto-Pozos, D., & Booth, J. R. (2025). A fMRI neuroimaging dataset of word reading with semantic and phonological localizers in children and adolescents. Data in Brief, 63, 112248. https://doi.org/10.1016/J.DIB.2025.112248
Funding: R01 DC018171 from National Institute of Deafness and other Communication Disorders (NIDCD)
EthicsApprovals: This study was approved by the Vanderbilt Institutional Review Board (IRB #171739)
